message.entry: Enable ROS signal logging to {0} bag file.

Topic name in row {0}, ''{1}'', must be a valid ROS name. ROS names start with an alphabetic character (a-z or A-Z), a tilde ~, or a forward slash /. Subsequent characters can be alphanumeric (a-z, A-Z, 0-9), forward slashes /, or underscores _.
Topic name ''{0}'' already exists in the table. Use a different topic name for this {1} message.
The Simulink model ''{0}'' has already been closed, so any changes to ROS Logger settings will be discarded.
Do not delete, this is an auto-generated function to log {0} message.
Logging information variables have been removed from Simulink Model Workspace. Use ROS Logger App to recreate them and retry.
Simulation Complete. Starting logging of {0} bag file...
The model, ''{0}'', does not have ''{1}'' bus signals. \nTo use ''{1}'' Logger, the Simulink model must contain at least one ''{1}'' bus signal.
Not enough space in current directory to save {1} bag file "{0}". Please navigate to another working directory and run the Simulation again.
